description:
The fearsome warlord, the demonic king—Oda Nobunaga! Before he was trying to rule over Japan, he was a teenager who began his path to greatness with his younger brother and faithful followers. Through succession, betrayal, battles, and bonds between one another, the struggles these boys face promise a future where they can blossom into powerful men.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Biographical
tags.description: Based on true stories of real persons living or dead, written by another.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Ninja
tags.description: Prominently features Japanese warriors traditionally trained in espionage, sabotage and assasination.

tags.name: Samurai
tags.description: Prominently features warriors of medieval Japanese nobility bound by a code of honor.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/_7265687568142)

Freelancer with a desk at [Studio Deen](https://anilist.co/studio/37/). Nakajima is strongly associated with the animated adaptations of the works of [Rumiko Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/96891/), having worked as an animation director on [Urusei Yatsura](https://anilist.co/anime/1293/), [Maison Ikkoku](https://anilist.co/anime/1453/) and [Ranma ½](https://anilist.co/anime/210/) also also serving as the character designer on latter.

She is married to [Tomohiro Hirata](https://anilist.co/staff/122071/).

__[Blog (JP)](http://ameblo.jp/sira10/)__

__Birthplace:__ Toride City, Ibaraki Prefecture, Japan

__Yuusuke Shirato__ is a Japanese arranger, composer, lyricist and musician.
Is the leader for the band [fhána](https://anilist.co/staff/118915/fhana) as well as keyboardist and vocalist.

__[Profile (Scoop Music)](https://www.scoop.co.jp/creator/detail.php?cd=35)__

__Birthplace:__ Mutsu City, Aomori Prefecture, Japan

__Tomoya Kawasaki__ is a Japanese lyricist, composer, arranger and guitarist.

Miyakawa Dan is a composer and keyboard player. He was born in Tokyo and graduated from Waseda University.

He is a member of Love Tambourines (ラヴ・タンバリンズ, not to be confused with Loverin Tamburin), where he plays the keyboard.
Twitter Matsue Jun (松江潤) is a guitarist from Tokyo, Japan.

[official site](http://satoko-drum.com/)

Satoko is the drummer of Fuzzy Control.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/u_suto_) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/u_suto_/)

Yuu Sutou is a Japanese bassist and member of musical ensemble [XIIX](https://xiix-web.com/).
Masakazu Satou is a music director and music producer.

streamingEpisodes.title: Episode 10 - Elder Brother and Younger Brother

title.native: アンゴルモア 元寇合戦記
